overview: THEY'RE BACK! (And their fronts.) Plus their sexy personalities! You'll flip over this video. Produced by Bob Michelucci, directed by John Russo and photographed by PLAYBOY Photographer Dan Golden, it's an eye-  popping mixture of cheesecake, bikini exercise routines and intimate interviews with starlets Veronica Carothers, Melissa Moore and Jasae.
tagline: Horror Films Most Beautiful Girls On A Sexy Swimsuit Workout!
title: Scream Queens Swimsuit Sensations
